description:
Also known as Lord Mathias or Mathias-sama, he is the Leader of the Religious Organization which supports the Knights of the Silver Tree.
It is also revealed that he is a fake Leader that was only chosen for his exceptional memory, because a new true leader hadn`t been born at the time that the previous leader died.
The Organization is trying to kill him so that René can take the title, but in Season 2`s episode 5, he kills the High Elder. He places an Artifact chip created by Erenfried on his neck to receive powers. Due to the chip, half of Mathias is his own self, half is controlled by the chip (therefore by Thanatos).
In season 2, he was killed by Nyx/Erebos when trying to protect René.
Source: Wiki
name: Mathias
